segments.text: I’m horrified by the water just pouring out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to slip and fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to topple off that stool, and it’s terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m scared that someone is going to get hurt in all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and it’s only a matter of time before it causes a problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to regret this if they don’t stop now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
